name: DEPOT BABI BALAH
address: Jl. Imam Bonjol No.339, Pemecutan Klod, Kec. Denpasar Bar., Kota Denpasar, Bali 80119, Indonesia
review 1:
Recommended!
The meats, spice, veggie were the perfect balance. However for me who can't eat spicy food, their sambal is very spicy but tasty.
Food took a bit of time to arrive. Friendly staff.
review 2:
Good ambiance, and it was cool, although the sun was shining...

We don't have to wait too long from the food order..
And the wood was good....
review 3: Good food, crispy and yet very tender pork, spicy sambal, Amazing pork ribs that are soft and filled with bbq flavor. Best part is The Friendly staff, reasonable price and food going out from their kitchen fast.
review 4: Babi balah, sate samcan, and sup babi were all very good. They come in small portions, so one is probably not enough.
review 5:
I like the place, so cozy and nice, specially to have local balinese dishes with friends. The location was not so difficult to find. The service was good and the staffs were kind and helpful.
The babi balah was delicious, specially for people that like spicy food. The pork soto (soup) was tasty and nice, only the samcan satay that was too fatty for me.
But overall it was a great food for dinner.

name: EC Executive Karaoke Bali
address: Jl. Imam Bonjol No.386, Pemecutan Klod, Kec. Denpasar Bar., Kota Denpasar, Bali 80119, Indonesia
review 1:
Absolutely incredible find. The "small" room which isn't small and is incredibly well equipped with private toilet awesome sound system and still comes with amazing drinks service is free to use! Absolutely incredible. I'd love to see what the paid rooms are like!! The alcoholic drinks are expensive to purchase and seems like you can only buy it by the bottle so we just had soft drink. Sooo many songs to choose from with great variety.
Wish you could turn our voice volume down but couldn't so just held mics away from us abit. üíØ would go again. Highly recommend
review 2: I can say here is one of the best karaoke places in Bali... The first is that the room is spacious with a toilet inside... Then We can sing to our heart's content by simply ordering a drink or food... Indeed, I admit that the prices for food and drinks here are expensive, but let's just say they break even because they don't set a specific amount that must be spent!!!
review 3: We were looking for a Karaoke Bar and google said this place. Certainly not the kind of Karaoke we were looking for, but we really enjoyed the experience. The song catalogue is huge. You purchase a room size (we got a free small room) and then purchase drinks and food. Unfortunately it seems you can only purchase spirits by the bottle so we stuck to soft drinks. There was quite a language barrier compared to other more touristy parts of Bali.
review 4: It was an amazing experience, it was first time for me and my friend. Sounds was working great, the room is absolutely clean, the staff were very friendly. I'll be back soon
review 5:
BEWARE the copious security, they used it to scam an extra 2million IDR.
We paid up after a great night, bill all settled. The hostess‚Äôs kept opening stuff in the minibar so there were extra expenses, annoying but no biggie. Paid up, said thanks and were waved on our way.
We had delays getting a taxi and they suddenly surrounded us in security and said we didn‚Äôt pay the bill. No receipt this time, just lots of pointing at a price list completely different to the one they showed us at the beginning of the night and demands of an extra 2 million.
If you must go, take a photo of the price list so they can‚Äôt pull this fast one.

name: New Star Club
address: Jl. Gn. Soputan No.16B, Pemecutan Klod, Kec. Denpasar Bar., Kota Denpasar, Bali 80119, Indonesia
review 1:
I recently had the chance to check out New Star Club in Denpasar, and it was a unique experience! While it might not be the flashiest club in town, it offered a chance to immerse myself in the local nightlife scene.

The atmosphere was friendly and casual. The crowd seemed like a mix of regulars and tourists, all there to have a good time. They had a DJ spinning a mix of current hits and Indonesian dance music, which kept the energy high.

I can't speak for the food, but they definitely had a wide selection of drinks available.  If you're looking for a luxurious club experience, this might not be it. But if you want to experience Denpasar's nightlife with a local twist, then New Star Club is a great option!

Overall, I'd recommend New Star Club for anyone looking for a fun and affordable night out in Denpasar.
review 3: F,ing awsome.  However drinks are a ripp off lol. None the less a great club
review 4: First time I came to this place by someone suggestion, it was weird experience the music dangdut koplo for someone sober come to this place will feel headeche, but it's  crowded and so..so for someone want to have fun and see something different in local area, I can say ..lower midle class place
review 5: Low standard, dirty place, better to close down this place

name: Taman Ayu Town House
address: Jl. Pulau Galang No.324, Pemogan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80221, Indonesia
review 1: Clean, great service and kids friendly
review 2:
Spacious rooms.  Immaculately maintained gardens and large swimming pool.
Pool shop had many items and cheap tasty meals.
Location ideally situated away from tourist hot spots so buying takeaway, clothes and groceries was a lot cheaper.
Above all, this place felt like with family and friends as all staff are very friendly and love kids
review 3: It is nice place to stay in especially when you want privacy. It is relatively close to the city and to the beach. They even clean your room daily (they will come and ask you if want it or not to be cleaned). They quickly respond to your request right away when you need something related to your room.
review 4: Thank you for the nice stay. Friendly crew. Cozy place. Nice pool!
review 5: Was a good place to stay with a big pool and the big places. Sadly, their staff who handling for marketing kinda bad, because before I had deal with her for bedroom with living room only @3millions, but when I would to pay off, the pricr more expensive 2 millions than at first her inform me, its become 5.xxx.xxx . Yes of course I wont do argue anymore, because I dont have a prove, however my respect to these place was not too best recommendation, if you guys still do cheating on price with that people who will becoming your guest into this place.

name: Rooftop Denpasar
address: Pemogan, Denpasar Selatan, Denpasar City, Bali 80119, Indonesia
types: coffee_shop, cafe, bar, store, restaurant, food
review 1: I like place cozy spacious and beautiful rooftop at 4th floor (upstair) Food are good, however i ordered matcha latte the taste wasn't mactha that i like. Recomended place!
review 2:
The food and drinks are good, and the view is great (esp. during sunset time).
The only problem is this place is located on 4th floor so you'll need extra energy to go up (stairs only). Buuut...again, it will worthy because you'll not regret to come here üòÅüòÅ

#story_of_dee
review 3: Nice please amazing and also good recomended nice baverage and alao food
review 4:
Good service, good staff, nice vieww.

I LIKE IT!!üì∏ü§©

name: Maharani Residence
address: Gg. Buntu No.57A, Pemecutan Klod, Kec. Denpasar Bar., Kota Denpasar, Bali 80119, Indonesia
review 1: The staffs are unresponsive. We told the staff we don‚Äôt need a house keeper but she still came in everyday. The house keepers will do your bed, but nothing else. The bathroom is filthy like it was never cleaned before. I dropped my soap bar once and found 10 hairs with at least 3 different colors on it.
review 2: Pretty room, pretty pool (you can use the pool). They have refrigerator, TV, hot water, air conditioner, pretty furnitures, and friendly room service. Worth the price. Love it! üëå
review 3: The best place if you want to avoid canggu but still want to get the vibe. Everything is clean and the owner always responsive. Defo come back for stay when in Bali
review 4: The price is sooo affordable anddd the place is extremely beautiful! Love at the first sight lol. The residence is also close to Seminyak or Kuta so its really gewddd! I will come here for the next stay for sure üíõ
review 5: Stay at Maharani always had a great experience for us. Clean room, staffs&owner are very helpful, def would come back here every month.

name: Savitri Home
address: Jl. Pulau Galang No.45, Pemogan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80225, Indonesia
review 1: Really nice & worth!

name: RedDoorz Plus near Jalan Imam Bonjol Denpasar
address: Jl. Kebak Sari No.5, Pemecutan Klod, Kec. Denpasar Bar., Kota Denpasar, Bali 80119, Indonesia
review 1: Very good room, service and location
review 2:
I will just tell what you should prepared before come to stay at this place.
1) Have your own clean TOWELS,
2) Have your own clean BED SHEETS,
3) Have your own DUST CLEANER and MOP,
4) Have your own WATER HEATER and TEA/COFFE MUG (GLASS),
5) Have your own MOSQUITOS DISINFECTANT,
6) Have your own CUTLERY and STOVE for mini-kitchen,
7) Have your own MAID if you're lazy enough to cleaning up your room.
8) Have more patience..

Hope that's all help enough to describe this place.

Good job RedDoorz, your brand getting huge on several places like this. üòé
review 3:
Stay for 4 night but extend until weekend.
Thay have some cuteeeee cat, love it.
Room was clean, spacious parking area but water but small on second floor.
review 4: It was great place. I recomend for you guys...

name: TahwaRonde Bali
address: Jl. Imam Bonjol No.339C, Pemecutan Klod, Kec. Denpasar Bar., Kota Denpasar, Bali 80119, Indonesia
review 1: Totally recommended for those for crave for something warm and sweet in the middle of cold night. Ordered their ginger soup (wedang) and some snacks, the ginger has very intense taste and sweet, good for sore throat, cold, comfort the stomach, fever, and many more. Looking forward to come here again
review 2: A place for people that do not like a sweet hot dessert. In fact their ronde and putu mayang were good, but i prefer it be served with sweeter taste.
review 3: This is what's been missing from Canggu area, a decent and unpretentious comfort night snacks with affordable price. It's totally worth driving more than 30 minutes from Canggu to Denpasar for this. Lovin' the Tahwa, Ronde, and Ketan Bubuk. Tastes just like what I had in Java. And the staffs are super nice too!
review 4:
Ordered Ronde and Tahwa here and they were pretty good. The ginger soup was on the stronger side for me.
For Tahwa, the tofu was very smooth. For Ronde, the mochi ball had peanut fillings and had other ingredients such as jelly and peanuts.

The service was fast and the prices were very reasonable.
review 5:
Parking:
Better with motorcycle but sometimes there's a parker so you can easily park with cars

Taste:
5/5

My usual order is kembang tahu & wedang ronde cost 10k

The warm ginger fluid really helps when your feeling ill & need something warm

name: OYO 90076 Guesthouse Graha Pande Residence
address: Gg. Griya Dadi Jl. Pulau Galang No.18, Pemogan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80119, Indonesia
review 1: Cozy place to stay. For both short-term or long-term period. 2 storey apartment with free wifi, AC, hot shower, swimming pool and pet friendly place. Affordable price and well located. Many delicious street foods around this place.
review 2: Great owner, would stay here just because he's nice :D

name: Depot Gomez Imam Bonjol - Babi Asap
address: Jl. Imam Bonjol No.350, Pemecutan Klod, Kec. Denpasar Bar., Kota Denpasar, Bali 80119, Indonesia
review 1: A place we always visit when we are in Bali! We usually always choose the hotplate, red beans soup, green beans with papaya flower! Plus that sour sambal‚Ä¶.. one of my favorite sambal!
review 2: Man i love this place! the staffs were so friendly and helpful! the food? im not exaggerating but i lost myself during the dinner. babi kecap was good. sei goreng was great. Sei hotplate?? the greatest. the surprises does't end. we order like 7 sharing menus and it only cost us about what, 300K. worth the visit, worth the try, worth the 5 star. oh and do not expect the place to be a high quality or well designed. i came for the food!!
review 3: If you crave for something smoky or just miss East Indonesia foods, this is the place for you. The place looks dark from the outside but apparently there's second floor that look significantly cleaner than the first floor. Foods was nice, their "Se'i babi" are mildly smoked and they are preparing the foods based on how patient you are, there are two types of menu, "sabar" and "tidak sabar" which I found it quite unique and funny at the same time.
review 4: This is not authentic bali food. Its from kupang, a city in east nusa tenggara. I like their fried pork ribs and red bean soup. Its even better than their main star, se'i (smoked pork). Btw, they have a branch in Muara Karang, North Jakarta.
review 5: This has become somewhat of a must-do tradition for me and my friends whenever we come to Bali, and it is for a good reason! They serve some of the best (if not the best) pork dishes on the island, dont come here expecting excellent service though, just come here, have a mouthgasm from the food, and go. Can‚Äôt reccommend this place enough.

name: GWA Residence
address: Gg. Ratna Sari III No.5, Pemogan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali, Indonesia
review 1: Nice place. Safe and clean. This is our second year here and we're somehow comfortable. You get what you pay for.
review 2: The place is nice and every room is given a house fence lock because the house fence is automatic

name: Siobak Lemuh Singaraja
address: Jl. Imam Bonjol No.451, Pemecutan Klod, Kec. Denpasar Bar., Kota Denpasar, Bali 80119, Indonesia
review 1: Food is good but not my taste. Is more like braise pork with pork soup
review 2: The place is quite cozy but the food taste great! They just need to improve the atmosphere on there.
review 3: The nearest siobak restaurant i can go to, so i just decide to go there last time i crave for siobak. But definetely not the best.. taste was okay though.. if you visit, try the pork satay it taste good, i can recommend the satay..
review 4: Not the best siobak, but the taste delicious, portion pretty good
review 5: Siobak, one of the option beside Babi Guling when you come to Bali. This is non halal food.

name: Joni‚Äôs House Kost
address: Jl. Pulau Galang Gg. Gn. Sari II No.7X, Pemogan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80119, Indonesia

name: Leassy Bali Rental & Cleaning Service
address: Setelah Babi Guling Kusuma Ayu, Jl. Imam Bonjol No.390 / 372, Pemecutan Klod, Kec. Denpasar Bar., Kota Denpasar, Bali 80119, Indonesia
review 1:
I recently had the pleasure of renting a motorbike, and I must say, the experience exceeded my expectations, especially in terms of affordability and convenience. First and foremost, the cost-effectiveness of this service was a standout feature. The rates were exceptionally reasonable, making it a perfect choice for those on a tight budget.

What impressed me the most was the simplicity of the entire process. From the moment I showed interest in renting, everything was handled smoothly and efficiently. The rental process was straightforward, with minimal paperwork and no unnecessary complications. This hassle-free approach made my experience much more enjoyable.

Truly recommended üôå
review 2:
I recently rented a bike from this service and had an excellent experience. I got an NMAX model, and it was in fantastic condition.
The rental price was very fair, and the staff was friendly and helpful. They made the whole process quick and easy.
Also the process for delivery and pickup at our hotel was a plus. Highly recommend this bike rental service for anyone looking for a reliable and affordable option!
review 3: I've been renting here for about a year and a half! The bike has become my family. If something happened, the guys were always quick to help me. I'm very grateful to them!!! It's a very good place!
review 4: The best bike rental service I ever had in Bali, everything was very professional and quick!üòç Super friendly staff , and I received really great support anytime I needed!üëèüèªüëèüèª Definitely will use their services again and again!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
review 5:
This is the Best service we had during our days in Bali!

We rent the scooter from them for 10 days with super cheap price (only 600k), for a new bike with good quality, good brake, strong. This lovely bike went with us to countless little roads on beautiful Bali. There are a lot of steepy roads, up and down the hills, and busy cities. But the bike was just like our good friend.

I love the blue bike that share with us our experience during 10 days in Bali.

One part of their service that makes me so much pleasure is they can give you the bike at the airport and you can return it in anywhere that adjacent to Denpasar. This is a super nice service because you can save millions to travel by taxi from airport to hotel.

So, enjoy their service ü©∑ü©∑ü©∑

name: Wisma Ayu
address: Jl. Pulau Galang No.324, Pemogan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80221, Indonesia
review 1: nice hostel

name: 315 Residence Comfort for Less
address: 854R+6M3, Jl. Pulau Galang, Pemogan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80119, Indonesia
review 1: place was quite far from anywhere, the room was actually decent, we had the pool right in front of our room, probably the best room in the place. unfortunately, a broken floor drain in the bathroom means our bathroom smelled awful pretty much all the time. but be warned, we had quite a bad experience because they only had one room available when we had booked two, which means we needed to mess around with our booking site to get a refund with the owner being quite unhelpful in all this situation. hopefully this problem could quickly be resolved because it's such a shame when the place is actually this nice to stay in!
review 2: I never seen security guard and any receptionist there other than that all is good have Cctv and clean place
review 3: Stuff very friendly. Nice place. But If it's full and busy. Last days was very busy and not quit.
review 4: If you want very cheap accommodation this is a good clean place but it is a little bit out of the way and far from the beach
review 5: Nice staff called supri.. But too expensive price for standard room. No cleaning service for room

name: Jina homestay kost-kostan
address: Gg. Gelatik No.11-3, Pemecutan Klod, Kec. Denpasar Bar., Kota Denpasar, Bali 80119, Indonesia
review 1:
I have been living at this charming guest house, but first of all i would like to mention BEWARE OF SCAMMERs!! In today‚Äôs digital age, be cautious with online transactions, especially for rentals or purchases. Scammers may ask for deposits before meeting in person or seeing the place. Recently, I encountered a scammer posing as a property owner, requesting a deposit upfront. Remember, legitimate owners usually meet in person first.

Okay, here's i share my experience about this cozy place‚ú® One of the standout features of this guest house is the array of fantastic facilities it offers. The presence of a smart TV in room is an absolute blessing, allowing me to unwind and enjoy netflix or spotify on TV.

The mini kitchen is good, providing the convenience of preparing my meals whenever I wish.

The environment around the guest house is nothing short of delightful. Surrounded by lush greenery and well-maintained.

Safety is a top priority here, and I appreciate the presence of CCTV cameras that provide an added layer of security. It gives me peace of mind knowing that the management takes the safety of its residents seriously.

The bathroom in this place is fantastic! It boasts a well-designed layout, and I was impressed by how clean and well-maintained it was. Plus, the presence of a water heaterüôåüèº

Another perk that I truly value is the availability of a parking lot for bikes. It makes commuting a breeze for someone like me who relies on a bike for transportation. (Notes: they don't have a space for car)

Moreover, the owner and management are incredibly friendly and accommodating. Their attentiveness and prompt response to any concerns or requests have made my stay even more enjoyable.

name: Kost Kubu Dauh
address: Gg. Penataran Sari IA No.18, Pemogan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80119, Indonesia
review 1: Owner is rude. Bosnya yang kasar. Some rooms don't have security. Must leave your room open because the windows have no lock. This is no good. Also air conditioning is very poor quality

name: Ultimate Residence Bali
address: Jl. Pulau Galang Gg. Ratna Sari III, Pemogan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80113, Indonesia
review 1:
Rooms were very clean. Bright, white, clean linnen.  Nice little balcony. Very quiet and very private area.  If you want to get away From the silliness of thr beaches, this is good choice.
The pool is inside. Very nice...
But weird thing is, its inside a dental clinic.
Also room service just reused Same sheets... the sheets were visibly "used", but housekeeping just reused Same sheets.
review 2:
i had really good time to stay here, it quite far from main road but still reachable by online driver for food or travel :)
it's clean & tidy, warm shower included.
room without refrigerator & slipper.
review 3: Was there for 2 weeks....had the best time...staff...food... excellent...best location...close to all you need....I will be staying  here again soon...
review 4: Clean and Comfy. Netflix on TV profile is locked.
